snippet.title: Exit/Corners - Trailer
snippet.description:
Five strangers find themselves trapped in an abandoned hotel that’s set to collapse in 24 hours. To escape alive, they'll have to solve their captor’s riddles and unravel the mystery behind their abduction.

Exit/Corners is an episodic adventure featuring visual novel story segments and riddle-based puzzles. 

For more information, visit exitcorners.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ExitCorners

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ExitCorners/
